name: SKYPlay
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Skyplay tokens are user-supplier governance tokens that start with a game and provide services between users and suppliers in conjunction with various online and offline businesses.
